医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
了解手术后疼痛的机制由维也纳 MedUni 和 IMBA（维也纳分子生物技术研究所）领导的国际研究小组在了解影响手术后疼痛感觉的机制方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Mechanisms-Of-Postoperative-Pain-Revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Mechanisms-Of-Postoperative-Pain-Revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b079682-9411-4c6d-9324-30712d6816e3 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 18:10:00 -0400 Understanding the mechanisms post-surgery pain
生物人工智能模型所需的改进治理和发布前安全评估人们对生物学中人工智能 (AI) 模型带来的生物安全风险的担忧持续增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Improved-governance-and-pre-release-safety-evaluations-needed-for-biological-AI-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Improved-governance-and-pre-release-safety-evaluations-needed-for-biological-AI-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cd27fbb-3156-481b-b101-371b3c443da9 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 17:56:30 -0400 Improved governance and pre-release safety evaluations needed for biological AI models
TLNRD1蛋白的发现有助于更好地了解脑海绵状血管瘤疾病研究人员发现了一种重要的蛋白质 TLNRD1，它可以帮助我们更好地了解和治疗脑海绵状血管瘤 (CCM) 疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Discovery-of-TLNRD1- Protein-could-help-better-understand-Cerebral-Cavernous-Malformations-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Discovery-of-TLNRD1- Protein-could-help-better-understand-Cerebral-Cavernous-Malformations-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a71649b5-50cc-442e-9254-989f9bbac0af Fri, 23 Aug 2024 17:50:40 -0400 Discovery of TLNRD1 protein could help better understand Cerebral Cavernous Malformations disease
研究表明衣原体可能持续存在于人类肠道中感染衣原体的人可以在无保护的性行为中将这些细菌传播给其他人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Research-suggests-chlamydia-may-persist-in-the- human-intestine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Research-suggests-chlamydia-may-persist-in-the- human-intestine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2d5f143-a420-4923-8796-2ac09ed10dca Fri, 23 Aug 2024 17:42:51 -0400 Research suggests chlamydia may persist in the human intestine
新技术增强了分子水平上复杂生物过程的研究乌普萨拉大学 Sebastian Deindl 教授领导的研究小组开发了一种开创性的方法，大大提高了在单分子水平上观察和分析复杂生物过程的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-technique-enhances-study-of-complex-biological-processes-at-the-molecular-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-technique-enhances-study-of-complex-biological-processes-at-the-molecular-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de021f66-dc8f-49d3-88c6-85b3d00a2915 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 17:32:06 -0400 New technique enhances study of complex biological processes at the molecular level
印第安纳大学的研究人员筹集了 400 万美元用于退伍军人健康研究印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员已通过美国退伍军人事务部的优异评审奖和职业发展计划累计获得近 400 万美元的资助，以支持糖尿病、皮肤炎症、癌症和衰老方面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/IU-researchers-secure-244-million-for-veterans-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/IU-researchers-secure-244-million-for-veterans-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ce45f8a-3a76-41ab-82ff-10b511bd03c3 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 17:00:38 -0400 IU researchers secure $4 million for veterans' health research
通用流感候选疫苗可在动物模型中提供针对严重感染的保护每年接种的流感疫苗可以预防严重感染，但它们的功效各不相同，并且可能与当季毒性最强的毒株不匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Universal-flu-vaccine-candidate-provides-protection-against-severe-infection-in-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Universal-flu-vaccine-candidate-provides-protection-against-severe-infection-in-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=420a3552-487b-4cea-b519-3c978fb95dbb Fri, 23 Aug 2024 16:46:12 -0400 Universal flu vaccine candidate provides protection against severe infection in animal models
研究强调流媒体平台上烟草促销的曝光度不平等德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的最新研究表明，数以千万计的美国人正在流媒体服务上接触烟草内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-highlights-unequal-exposure-to-tobacco-promotion-on-streaming-platforms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Study-highlights-unequal-exposure-to-tobacco-promotion-on-streaming-platforms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75dd35a0-e19e-445f-bbf9-d3776f683937 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 16:38:33 -0400 Study highlights unequal exposure to tobacco promotion on streaming platforms
独特的益生菌菌株显示出对抗炎症性疾病的潜力帮助收紧和维持健康的肠道屏障以及治疗肠漏的关键需求尚未得到满足。研究人员现已发现，一种独特的益生菌菌株——两歧双歧杆菌 BB1，可以增强肠道屏障功能，防止细菌和各种有害物质侵入肠道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Unique-strain-of-probiotic-bacteria-shows-潜在-in-combating-炎症-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Unique-strain-of-probiotic-bacteria-shows-潜在-in-combating-炎症-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25d3e1a4-5edc-48ee-b2ee-894f4fac67a5 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 16:34:53 -0400 Unique strain of probiotic bacteria shows potential in combating inflammatory diseases
直肠癌的新疗法为避免手术带来了希望一种治疗局部晚期直肠癌的新疗法显示出良好的效果，因为有时可以完全避免手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-treatment-for-直肠癌-offers-hope-in​​-avoiding-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-treatment-for-直肠癌-offers-hope-in​​-avoiding-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ded5ae98-46d7-4bdf-ad6e-1d03a102e37f Fri, 23 Aug 2024 16:30:09 -0400 New treatment for rectal cancer offers hope in avoiding surgery
